com.pz.reader.util
Class ParserUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.pz.reader.util.ParserUtils
public class ParserUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Version:
2.0
Author:
zepernick Static utilities that are used to perform parsing in the DataSet class These can also be used for low level parsing, if not wishing to use the DataSet class.

Method Detail

splitLine

public static java.util.List splitLine(java.lang.String line,
                                       java.lang.String delimiter,
                                       java.lang.String qualifier)
Returns an ArrayList of items in a delimited string. If there is no qualifier around the text, the qualifier parameter can be left null, or empty. There should not be any line breaks in the string. Each line of the file should be passed in individually.

Parameters:
line - - String of data to be parsed
delimiter - - Delimiter seperating each element
qualifier - - qualifier which is surrounding the text
Returns:
ArrayList

getColumnMDFromFile

public static java.util.List getColumnMDFromFile(java.io.InputStream theStream,
                                                 java.lang.String delimiter,
                                                 java.lang.String qualifier)
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
Returns a list of ColumnMetaData objects. This is for use with delimited files. The first line of the file which contains data will be used as the column names
